title: God #1 and #2 again. Circumcision in America. PVK Q/A Jan 28 2022
description:
Weekly Q/A on the Bridges of Meaning Discord Server, Fridays at 11am Pacific Time.

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/rkhTpjpm

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link.
